documentation.text: @dev Initializes the contract setting the deployer as the initial Governor.
@dev Returns the address of the current Governor.
@dev Returns the address of the current Governor.
@dev Returns the address of the pending Governor.
@dev Throws if called by any account other than the Governor.
@dev Returns true if the caller is the current Governor.

@dev Prevents a contract from calling itself, directly or indirectly.
 Calling a `nonReentrant` function from another `nonReentrant`
 function is not supported. It is possible to prevent this from happening
 by making the `nonReentrant` function external, and make it call a
 `private` function that does the actual work.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Only the pending Governor can complete the claim"

arguments.value: Only the pending Governor can complete the claim

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only the pending Governor can complete the claim"

documentation.text:
@dev Claim Governance of the contract to a new account (`newGovernor`).
 Can only be called by the new Governor.

@dev Change Governance of the contract to a new account (`newGovernor`).
 @param _newGovernor Address of the new Governor

devdoc.author: Origin Protocol Inc
devdoc.details: Copy of the openzeppelin Ownable.sol contract with nomenclature change      from owner to governor and renounce methods removed. Does not use      Context.sol like Ownable.sol does for simplification.

claimGovernance().details: Claim Governance of the contract to a new account (`newGovernor`). Can only be called by the new Governor.

constructor.details: Initializes the contract setting the deployer as the initial Governor.

governor().details: Returns the address of the current Governor.

isGovernor().details: Returns true if the caller is the current Governor.

transferGovernance(address).details: Transfers Governance of the contract to a new account (`newGovernor`). Can only be called by the current Governor. Must be claimed for this to complete

devdoc.title: OUSD Governable Contract
